welcome_message_body: Welcome to Southport, a charming seaside town known for its stunning coastline, Victorian architecture, and vibrant entertainment. We invite you to explore and enjoy all the beauty and history this lovely city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Warton Airport, primarily used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackpool Airport is the primary hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Executive Terminal
terminals.description: The executive terminal provides a more luxurious and private experience for VIP travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Charter Terminal
terminals.description: The charter terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport is used for seasonal and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
